Name: Super Ladies Companion
Description:
The Ladies Companion is a nice pepper-box kind of pocket pistol
But it's a small gun, for small pockets

This is why I propose to you to carry the gun that is made for the ones who have deep pockets
It's longer, but also meaner! It got upgraded from the tiny little wimpy .22LR to the glorious and powerful .22WMR!

And it even features hidden attachments points! For extra tacticoolness!

(Muzzle attachments are broken on this one too, oops)
ShortDescription: Ladies Companion but longer and in .22WMR
